text: Garden Village AFC are a football club based in Kingsbridge, Swansea. They were formed in 1922.https://ardalsouthern.cymru/ardal-sw/clubs-sw/garden- village/ They play in the West Wales Premier League.https://www.allwalessport.co.uk/football.aspx?cid=14378 They play at a football pitch called Stafford Common.https://official.sportnetwork.net/main/s221/st20347.htm ==References== Category:Welsh football clubs Category:Swansea
title: Garden Village AFC
